text: Bad Urach is a town in Reutlingen in Baden-WÃ¼rttemberg in Germany. It is 14 km east of Reutlingen. It is at the foot of the Swabian Jura. Bad Urach is known for its spa. == Districts == Bad Urach has five districts: * Bad Urach * Hengen * Seeburg * Sirchingen * Wittlingen == Sights == Bad Urach has a late medieval market square with a town hall and half-timbered houses, dating from the 15th and 16th centuries. There are many sights: the residential castle, the Church of Saint Amandus, the ruins of an old castle (Schloss Hohenurach) and the waterfall (Uracher Wasserfall). == References == == Other websites == * Official website of Bad Urach Category:Spa towns in Germany Category:Reutlingen (district)
title: Bad Urach
